level.heading: Existing projections.
level.text: ยง 27-312 Existing projections. Any part of a building that projects beyond a street line on January first, nineteen hundred thirty-eight may be maintained as constructed until its removal is directed by the council or the board of estimate. (a) Alterations. Alterations to existing projections beyond the street line may be permitted in whole or in part, provided that such alterations conform with the requirements of this subchapter.
